title: Print, "Decoration d'une chamber de parade vüe du côté du Lit, in Jacques-Francois Blondel "De La Distribution des Maisons de Plaisance, et de la Decoration des Edifices en General," 2 Vols., Paris: Charles-Antoine Jambert, 1738, vol. 2, Chap. III, pl. 82, p. 110", 1738
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Decoration d'une chamber de parade vüe du côté du Lit, in Jacques-Francois Blondel "De La Distribution des Maisons de Plaisance, et de la Decoration des Edifices en General," 2 Vols., Paris: Charles-Antoine Jambert, 1738, vol. 2, Chap. III, pl. 82, p. 110", 1738.
1738. Engraving on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-241-87.
